overview.en: Based on blockchain and smart contract technology and according to the social incentive mechanism and consumption behavior, STC is a value sharing exchange token developed by Singapore Starlink Foundation for the social application DAPP Zevok. Users can download and use the Zevok APP to get it in a more efficient and convenient way.
overview.zh: 谢尔币（STC）是基于区块链和智能合约技术，由新加坡星链基金会针对社交应用DAPP 之音（ZEVOK）社交激励机制和消费行为制定出来的价值共享交换代币，用户可以通过下载使用之音(Zevok)App轻量化获取。
